text: So HubSpot work to this bug ?
I mentioned this to them the other day and they said they were working on it

Can anyone help me with an inherited value in a global module? I have the inherited value pulling from my theme settings. In the global editor for the module it shows the colors (picture 2) but it is not loading them onto the page {pictures 3 and 4). If I change the color in the editor it loads the new color just fine. It's only the inherited defaults that aren't working.
